Please do, Rdahl. I'll take him back in a few days, but its kinda chaotic here right now. The server got disconnected from the net (which is the reason that there's no NBW site at the moment), and I'm trying to get it back up.

::Stratus::

Stratus nods at his orders, walking over to the water and entering it. He transforms into beast mode, swimming out toward the ship.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Yan if you don't have time I can take Blot for now.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> The 50 foot behemoth turns his massive head, it shaking slowly, as he
> looks out along the shore line. His eyes were totally devoid of feeling,
> whatever the creature was thinking, it was most likely a survival
> program. He took a step back to get a better look, his massive foot
> lifting up, and moving towards the forest area that was lit. Sinnertwin
> looked up, quickly transformed, and scrambled out of the way, as his
> body area was replaced by the foot, which crunched into the ground,
> causing a slight tremor across the small island, as the ground began to
> split open. His huge foot easily sank into the rock, as he turned, to
> look out over the horizen. He then shifted his head, looking downward.
> "What we do?" he asked towards no one in perticular, his deafening voice
> shaking the air. What was left of the forest erupted with life, as herds
> of animals scrambled away in fear at the sudden comotion.
